title: Foster care in the U.S. - number of children waiting for adoption 2007 to 2018
summary: In general Number of children has rose over the Year.
Number of children is roughly constant from 2011 to 2013, gradually increasing from 2013 to 2017, and lastly roughly constant from 2017 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2016 and 2017.
Maximum Number of children, about 125422.0 was reported at Year 2018
The lowest Number of children, of value 101945.0 was reported at Year 2012
